text:
We have dedicated GPO machines with latest OS and patches so I didn't think
about that. That is exactly why we have W10 and W11 GPO machines so we do not
need to copy templates to the central store each month (they change nearly every
month). Markus Am 21/11/2023 um 14:18 schrieb James M. Pulver:
Link: None

metadata.topic: Windows 10 will be able to join in the fun of Copilot
metadata.subject: Re: [patchmanagement] Windows 10 will be able to join in the fun of Copilot
